SEARCH
Package com.poseidoncapitalsolutions.trading.controller

Class TradeController

java.lang.Object
com.poseidoncapitalsolutions.trading.controller.TradeController
@Controller public class TradeController extends Object
Controller responsible for handling operations related to Trades. Provides endpoints for viewing, adding, updating, and deleting trades.

      public TradeController(TradeService tradeService, TradeMapper tradeMapper)
      Constructs a TradeController with the given service and mapper.

      tradeService - The service to interact with Trade data.
      tradeMapper - The mapper to convert Trade entities to DTOs.

  • Method Details

    • home

      @GetMapping("/trade/list") public String home(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a list of all trades.
      Parameters:
      model - The model to add the trades to.
      Returns:
      The view name for the trades page.

    • addUser

      @GetMapping("/trade/add") public String addUser(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form to add a new trade.
      Parameters:
      model - The model to add a new empty TradeDTO to.
      Returns:
      The view name for the trade add form.

    • validate

      @PostMapping("/trade/validate") public String validate(@ModelAttribute("newTrade") @Valid @Valid TradeDTO trade, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Validates and adds a new trade.
      Parameters:
      trade - The new TradeDTO to be added.
      result - The result of validating the trade.
      model - The model to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the trade list page if successful, or the form page if validation fails.

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/trade/update/{id}") public String showUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the form to update an existing trade.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the trade to update.
      model - The model to add the existing trade data to.
      Returns:
      The view name for the trade update form.

    • updateTrade

      @PostMapping("/trade/update/{id}") public String updateTrade(@PathVariable("id") int id, @ModelAttribute("updatedTrade") @Valid @Valid TradeDTO trade, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates an existing trade.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the trade to update.
      trade - The updated TradeDTO.
      result - The result of validating the updated trade.
      model - The model to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the trade list page if successful, or the form page if validation fails.

    • deleteTrade

      @GetMapping("/trade/delete/{id}") public String deleteTrade(@PathVariable("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Deletes a trade by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the trade to delete.
      model - The model to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the trade list page after deletion.
